name: Ninja Shooter | Mini-Game |
description:
Ninja Shooter - Mini-Game  =====  ★ Story ★ 

You're a little Ninja, which always wanted to became a Master... but you didn't had the opportunity. Now, it's your turn! Make everyone know about your amazing skills at being a Ninja!

 =====  ★ Features ★ 

» Two Different Types of Enemies 

» Coins » Cool art 

» ☁ Highscore ☁ 

» Cool score counter - Thank you @griffpatch 

=====  ★ Game Info ★ 

» Specially made for using @griffpatch's Number Counter.

» Doesn't contains an awesome Menu, cause it's unneded. 

» All art was made in vector, except the thumbnail. 

» 15 Sprites / 2 Backdrops / 43 Costumes 

» Variables Name Symbols explained below. 

» Contains an Intro by: @ThePro255 & @Arcunal 

» Block Count: 1,130 Blocks 

» Time Expended: 12 Hours 

=====  ★ Variables Info ★ 

If you want to learn about why and for what I've used this variables, just read this. But please, make sure you just give credit! Variables Info Name Symbols 

» _ Related with Menu

 » @ Related with momement 

» ~ Related with gameplay » # Related with Obstacles For what?

 » _cos = make the things to turn X degrees to make it look nicer 

» @Xv= X velocity, movement of X 

» @Yv= Y velocity, movement of Y 

» ~Game= when you start playing it sets game to on so the obstacles and player will show, and it'll delete the menu and its sound effects. 

» #Live = is our player alive?

 » #Evil = It says if there're evil things around. 

===== 

★ Instructions ★ 

» Move with arrows keys, wasd or mobile friendly!

 » Shoot with Space Bar. 

» Kill Evil Ninjas and Spikes by shooting 

» Collect Falling Coins. » Beat the Highscore!
